name: American Soft Linen Luxury 6 Piece Towel Set, 2 Bath Towels 2 Hand Towels 2 Washcloths, 100% Cotton Turkish Towels for Bathroom, Silver Grey Towel Sets
about_this_item: ✅ Turkish Luxury 6 Piece Towel Set Includes 2 Bath Towels of 27 x 54 inches, 2 Hand Towels of 16 x 28 inches and 2 Washcloths of 13 x 13 inches.
✅ 100% Cotton Turkish Towel Set is 600 GSM. These Bathroom Towels are Soft, Absorbent, Thick and Quick Drying enough for your Body , Hand and Face after Shower.

✅ These Towels are OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 Certified and Tested for Harmful Substances. Premium Quality Fluffy Towels will make you feel and give you comfort as if you are in luxurius hotel, spa, gym, sauna, pool etc.
✅ Due to variances in computer color management and monitor settings the color displayed on customer screen may differ from the actual product color.
✅ THIS ITEM IS RETURNABLE AND COMPLIES WITH AMAZON'S REFUND AND RETURN POLICY.
